column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThe programme aims to provide the theoretical, clinical and research skills necessary for physicians who wish to pursue a career in audiovestibular medicine.About this degreeThe programme aims to provide the theoretical, clinical and research skills necessary for physicians who wish to pursue a career in audiovestibular medicine.It also aims to ensure that graduates are scientifically literate at postgraduate level as well as clinically competent in medical otology and audiology.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time, 5 years flexible
